short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: String manipulation using replace() function in javascript.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Utility allows user to do text manipulation using javascript's build in replace function. This is especially useful when manipulating data from Excel where data transformation is not easy to do.
